add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Recruit! It's good to see you're still in one piece.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Apologies for the harsh welcome earlier.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (stress 'cannot')Communications cut off as soon as you engaged those Xenon infrastructure units, and I cannot stand having no vision on my subordinates.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: There's no need for a detailed report, recruit.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: My staff has already extracted your ship logs the moment you arrived.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: It is beyond dispute that what you have witnessed is of the utmost concern to the Protectorate, but that is only half of the reason why I called you here personally.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: You have displayed unquestioning obedience and clarity of mind in the most stressful of situations, and distinguished yourself as a defender of Sol in even the darkest hours of our operation.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (gets a bit intense)I hereby raise you to the rank of special operative, and no, refusal is not an option.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (more lenient, reveals that she was tongue-in-cheek)But I might deign to answer some of your questions, if you have any. No classified subjects though.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: A cutting-edge operation to strengthen societal cohesion, or, if you believe Intervention, just another failed experiment.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: When I originally pitched the idea, I was mostly concerned with creating a common cause for the disenfranchised of Sol, though drawing in foreign attention-seekers turned out to be a welcome side-efffect.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: After all, why would you care, stand up and fight for our beautiful system if you felt like a second-class citizen, or worse, an alien?

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: I suppose there are a few parallels to the Pioneers Initiative. Another campaign that defied expectations in its own way.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Call it a hunch, but I'm sure that you'll be able to see that for yourself very soon.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (deliberating)I suppose I do owe you an explanation.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: ('glorious' is meant sarcastically)Yes, I suspected that the glorious Intervention Corps would have an eye on us from the start, and I did recognise the captain of that transport ship immediately.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: I do understand his perspective: a ragtag bunch of barely-citizens, would-be heroes and foreigners, defending Sol?

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: That sounds like a recipe for failure.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Still, I did not expect commander Lee to degrade himself and pry around right under our noses, only to then spit on our efforts when he saw us stumble.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: My department might not have much power in the grand scheme of things, but this will have consequences, believe me.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: My analysts are not entirely sure about the exact order of events; for that, we would have to interrogate Shinamon himself, and he remains MIA.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Judging from your report alone, he might have been abducted, but that was only the tip of the iceberg.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: I really should have read the signs beforehand; after all, predicting the movements of ally and enemy alike is core to my job here.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: For some reason, Shinamon must have tried desperately to make a name for himself, to be inquisitive and proactive in every situation.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: He also seemed to have an eery aptitude for the Xenon; I suppose that growing up with stories about the glorious Terran war against the machine scourge played a certain role.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (a bit somber)Trying to understand that which cannot be understood might have been his downfall.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (sighs)That was an unfortunate confrontation to say the least.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: We came close to a debacle, but I was ultimately able to smooth things over with the Secretary of the Antigone Republic.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: When interacting with the rest of the Gate network, we will always attempt to show ourselves from our best angle, but make no mistake.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (intense)Earth will not allow herself to be abused, or threatened, ever again.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (unusually warm)For now, you leave through that door, and you recover.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (a bit more firmly)Once you feel ready, come talk to me again.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Surely there will be ample opportunity to apply your very particular set of skills.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Well, I must say that I am hesitant to send you away again so soon, but since you're asking, there might indeed be something to help take your mind off these unfortunate events.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: That is, if you think you're ready.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (variant 1)Good to see you, operative. / (variant 2)Welcome back, operative.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Ready for your next mission?

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Take your time.

do_if.comment: Only if the player wanted to continue right away.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: I see, no time to waste, am I right?

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Ever since you handed in your report, my people have been working tirelessly to find a connection between a number of intriguing events that have occurred in Sol over the course of the last few weeks.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: The first incidents were barely beyond the ordinary: high-tech traders missing cargo, manipulated delivery schedules, the occasional kidnapping and ransoming...

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Then things began to ramp up: top secret deliveries being raided, fake distress signals targeting our military trainees, sabotage on a grand scale.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: And lately, more and more of these incidents involve the Xenon in some fashion.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: We can no longer ignore the possibility of a major new threat for the Terran Protectorate.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Ever since your last report, we've been fairly sure that our opponents are the infamous Yaki.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: To make it short, they're pirates. Our data suggests that they've originally spawned from members of the Argon Federation. Another splinter group they couldn't keep under control.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: The Yaki have always dabbled in dangerous technology, and they seem to only have doubled down on that alarming tendency since we last had the pleasure to make contact.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: One of their criminal spin-off enterprises, the infamous Beryll, was responsible for an AGI drone attack on Earth in recent history.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Expect their ships to be heavily armed and manoeuvrable.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Ah, yes, indeed. I recognise you might have... personal reasons for your interest, so it only seems prudent to offer you this assignment first.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: The objective is simple: Find out where these pirates are hiding, what their goals are, and whether they can be defeated.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Unfortunately, you will only be able to call upon limited support during your mission.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: As an undercover operative, it is paramount that no direct connection can be drawn between you and the Terran Secret Service.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Once you leave Protectorate space, you're on your own.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: I can provide some guidance to help you start, but ultimately you will be the one making decisions under pressure.

text.comment: (variant 2)You and cadet Shinamon recently encountered an especially malicious distress signal trap that was presumably set by these Yaki. (variant 1)Two of our cadets recently encountered an especially malicious distress signal trap that was presumably set by these Yaki.
They seem to be targeting specific Terran ships for some reason. And since they're keen on eliminating anyone who follows their trail, that reason remains a mystery to us.
If we catch them in the act, that will tell us more about their objectives.
An advanced satellite should be able to pick up on all distress signals in the sector. My team will evaluate the data and point you towards potential discrepancies.
With your record, you will do just fine, operative. I will leave you to prepare.

(incredulous)Captain? Are you sure...
(determined)Of course I am sure! We're Pioneers, and we won't be done in by a pirate!
(unhinged, almost screaming)Fools! I will see you slaughtered for this!

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (very friendly)Yes? How can I help you?

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (eager)Ah, yes, I've been expecting another delivery. One shipment of Terran tech, unloaded and ready for sampling.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (thoughtful)A few of these crates are damaged. That's a bit troubling.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: You wouldn't know anything about that, now, would you?

set_value.name: $Atreides_Overdid_It
set_value.comment: Changes the dialog with Atreides in the next chapter.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (firmly)True, but you can't keep going overboard.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (empathetic)I know how much this operation means to all of you, but if Protectorate citizens keep getting hurt, that'll put us all in danger.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (warmly)Here, take this as a token of thanks... and maybe tell Atreides to not overdo it.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (nervous)Oh, I see you're not familiar with our customs procedures.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (nervous)Don't worry about it. Here, take this as well. And you'll have to excuse me, but I'm quite busy.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (relieved)Thank you. Finally someone who's reasonable.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (surprised)A Yaki... attack?

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (nervous, starts by clearing her throat)Yes, of course. That's something we take very seriously. I will inform the local authorities right away.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (gathers herself)Please, deliver my thanks to Captain Atreides for his bravery.

signal_cue.comment: Will give out the reward after a short delay.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_1
add_npc_line.comment: Stars' light upon you.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_1
add_npc_line.comment: My people are spread far, and I consider it my holy duty to travel the Gate network and give spiritual guidance to those in need.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_1
add_npc_line.comment: One day, these Pioneers will perceive that their work is guided by the sacred geometry of the cosmos that shaped us all.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_1
add_npc_line.comment: However, I have realised, with great regret, that not even my Paranid brethren among the scientific elite can spare the time for my counsel.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_1
add_npc_line.comment: Truly a tragic display of hubris. I had no choice but to withdraw to this humble place, so that I may meditate, and resume my service among the lowest of the low.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_1
add_npc_line.comment: These people desperately need someone to teach them serenity and contentment. This area of the Gate network houses so many disparate peoples, so much potential for strife.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_1
add_npc_line.comment: (sighs)And even on this station, there is scarcely a moment of peace. Not so long ago I observed a pilot with a terribly asymmetrical face storm through these serene halls, assailing innocent bystanders.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_1
add_npc_line.comment: (pitiful)It would truly be a shame if this budding community were to wither in senseless conflict.

text.comment: Good day to you.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: Greetings, fellow Pioneer.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: I am on a trade mission for the local branch of the Teladi Company.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: If things go well, I may soon call myself CEO of the Uguras Foundation, purveyor of progress and business partner of the Segaris Pioneers.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: Independence is truly one of the greatest catalysts for profit.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: (scoffs)Everyone here is so secretive. It feels as if I am constantly walking on eggshells.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: That customs officer is the worst of the entire clutch. If you miss one small bit of the customs code and answer in the wrong fashion, you suddenly find yourself left outside and a deal short.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: Have you heard that certain sensory impressions can trigger memories?

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: For me personally, it's the sight of my credit balance increasing.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: A pleasure doing business with you. I can already feel it all coming rushing back to me.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: Now, I do vividly remember seeing a man, most likely an Argon, leaving the customs office in a hurry.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: As a Teladi, I can't really comment on such things, but one of his kind may indeed have described him as unseemly. His face bore strange markings, possibly from a war injury or a cheap surgery.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: That said, I was supposed to discuss a trade agreement today, and my appointment keeps getting postponed.

add_npc_line.speaker: $PioneersCivilianActor_2
add_npc_line.comment: I've waited quite long enough. Farewell, generous patron.

do_if.comment: After giving the player his bit of info, he leaves.

text.comment: Profits to you.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (boastful)Hello there, pilot.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (boastful)End up here? I was with the Pioneers from the very start! Well, almost.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Mining rights were difficult to come by back in those days, and if you're just some odd-jobber on the edges of Sol, the well-oiled machine of the Terran Protectorate economy treats you like space dust.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: No offence, by the way. Don't know if you're affiliated, but you did meet up with us coming from that direction.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (indignant; interrupts himself)Does she now? Gah! The gall of that woman! She's the one who got us into that situation in the first place!

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (frustrated)Oh, I'll tell her a story all right, when I next meet her.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (sputtering)Uh, nothing in particular. You know, the usual dangers of long-distance hauling... I mean, mining.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (confident again)Don't concern yourself with that. Right now, all is well, and you're our honoured guest.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (sputtering)She did what? Ah, yes, of course! The bravery!

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (gathers himself, boastful again)And when those Xenon started pouring in, and we just blasted them out of the sky? That was glorious, wasn't it?

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (boastful)Couldn't have done it without you, friend.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (scoffs)And she told you that? You two must be getting rather close already.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (sighs)Look, I'm not saying she's wrong. I know I jumped the gun. Might have endangered the entire operation.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (embarrassed)I'm sorry I misjudged you. I simply saw a ship I didn't know, arriving at that crucial moment, and tried my best to keep up appearances.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (somber)But I know that doesn't change anything. I... should maybe just stay away from Shani for a while. A very long while.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (shocked)No! I'm innocent, I swear!

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (grasping at straws)That customs officer has been in cahoots with those pirates this entire time! I wouldn't be surprised if she was a Yaki herself!

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (disgusted)You disgust me, Atreides. We made a promise.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (shouting after someone who's walking away)I'm only telling the truth, Reuven! I keep telling you that we can't stand up to the Protectorate!

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (pleading)Please don't tell your superiors. Apprehend that customs officer, and this entire mess will be cleaned up, I promise!

debug_text.text: 'Atreides confronted. Puzzle solved. Conversation ends automatically.'

text.comment: (shouting)Damn it. Reuven, wait!
(magnanimously)Enjoy your stay.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (hesitant)Hello there.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (relieved)Oh, I'm just working for the captain over there.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (hesitant to talk about pirates)It's a well-paying job, all things considered. Especially with all the... pirate attacks recently.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (hesitant)Yeah, about that...

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (firmly)You do realise that we're professionals, right? That we've probably dealt with pirates in the past?

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (frustrated)That situation could have gone a lot worse. But it also could have gone a whole lot better if we'd made even the slightest effort to de-escalate.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (more friendly)Look, I'm glad you came to help us out, but next time, try to read the situation first. Should probably tell that to the captain, too.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (defiantly)Yeah? What makes you think that?

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (whispers urgently)OK, OK, calm down. Please don't make any rash decisions.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: We're not criminals, all right? We're the neglected stepchild of the Terran Protectorate, and we've got to make ends meet somehow.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: Sometimes, one of those Yaki needs something from us, and we need something from them. We didn't expect it to turn sour this suddenly.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: Please don't make a fuss. I'll tell you what you want to know.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: Hah, that sort of knowledge is way above my pay grade. I only know that it has something to do with all those new research programs that have sprung up in these parts.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: Apparently, our scientists are constantly hitting a wall, and those Yaki just so happen to sometimes have the solution... in exchange for high tech components, for the most part.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (scoffs)Well, good luck with that.

add_npc_line.speaker: $MiningSubordinateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (deliberating, then warningly)Tamatha might know, but be gentle with her. She's just lost someone, and I imagine she's too worked up to sit through one of your interrogations.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (trembling)What do you want? Are you threatening me? I have no further business with you!

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (quietly)Thank you for letting me know.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (quietly)Maybe it's for the best. Towards the end, he was a danger to himself, and everyone around him.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: We might have been, once.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (sighs)It's true, by the way. He came to me, quite recently. Went on and on about this new piece of cyberware he'd built out of Terran high tech.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (smiles to herself)He was so proud. And of course he wanted me to have it; thought that it would make me reconsider my decision and maybe go back with him.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (sad)He was already so far gone. I couldn't bring myself to say no, and so I took it. Kept it with me, even though I knew I'd never return... there.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (steels herself)Here, I'll make you an offer. You seem... more sensible than I expected, and I have a feeling that you wouldn't stop searching just because I told you to get lost.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: You go ahead and take this. See where it leads you.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: All I ask of you is to keep an open mind, and don't judge a book by its cover. There are going to be a few ugly ones where you're headed.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: Good luck.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (bitter)What's that supposed to tell me? That you're willing to murder the unfortunate until you get what you want? Is that how you negotiate?

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (bitter)There are many here like me. People who've found a glimmer of purpose with the Pioneers, after everything else failed them.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (bitter)And day after day, people like you, who just want to ruin our lives for the sake of it, keep showing up.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (determined; 'you' refers to the lackeys of the Terran Protectorate)I won't put up with it any more. I can't. You will just keep coming.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (determined)You say you killed one of my friends? Just like that?

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiCivilianActor
add_npc_line.comment: (determined, angry)I won't let you hurt anyone else.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Well, where do I start? Where would you start, if you were in my place?

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (variant 1)You suddenly barge into our system, in a ship that obviously doesn't belong to you...

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (variant 2)You suddenly barge into our system, in a Terran-made warship...

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: You're a damn security risk!

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (sighs)Because you're not the first to arrive here.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (disgusted, spit the word 'scientists')Ever since the realignment of the Gates, we're picking up scrappers, adventurers, scientists.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Maniacs, all of you!

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: But we can't let anyone die out here. There are already far too few of us.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: I'm not asking you to join the Yaki. We all have our allegiances.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (stress 'am')But I am asking you to have a closer look, make your rounds, see how we live.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Might just change your perspective.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (mockingly)Oh, have I not made my formal speech yet?.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (mockingly, with pathos, switch to serious after 'freebooting')Welcome to the home of the Yaki, freedom-loving, freebooting and who am I kidding.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: What you see here is the last remnant of the Yaki. At least the last that we know of.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: When those Gates shut down, two generations ago, my people got stranded here together with the Xenon.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Most died in that first week. A few found hiding spots inside an abandoned outpost.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: And then, some star-sent augmentation artists found the solution.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: These things on my face, they're not just for show, you know?

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: I don't exactly know how they function, but they keep the Xenon away... most of the time.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: ('aug-art' is the art of facial augmentation)But that's not all: This aug-art also lets a few of the most 'gifted' Yaki... do things to the Xenon, prod them here and there.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: It doesn't always work, and you've seen what happens when you indulge too much, but it kept us alive.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: And so here we are: Pirates to some, abominations to others, and with the Xenon strapped to our back like a damn tumour.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (resigned)Doesn't matter if we stay or leave. Either way, we're fair game.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Good. Then he's no longer a threat.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Don't get me wrong. It's kind of sad that he's gone. He was a good Yaki once.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: But the way he plastered himself with those cybernetics, with no regard for his or our safety?

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: There's really only one way this could have ended.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (somber)That's... a real shame.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: I can only hope you regret it.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Tamatha left because she saw the end approaching from lightyears away, but she still tried to help us out from a distance.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (sighs)Seems like it caught up with her first.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Damn right I am.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Thanks to that fool Obelisk, the war's already under way.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: With you on the loose, there'll at least be one more pilot with a brain... and a conscience, I hope.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Another thing: I called you a stranger earlier, and that was a lie.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: There's someone I'd like you to meet.

do_if.comment: After asking about leaving, the conversation ends.

text.comment: (serious, as if avoiding eye contact)Hey.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: Well, this is kind of awkward. Don't know if you were expecting to see me.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: Maybe you were. Maybe that's why you came in the first place.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (tense)Doesn't matter. What counts is that you're here right now.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: That's... not an easy question to answer.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (obviously lying)I guess I was kind of overwhelmed back there.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (obviously lying)If you remember, we thought we were hot on a trail and then everything went nova.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (obviously lying)Orcanic pulled me out when that maniac Obelisk disabled my ship.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: (obviously lying)Been here since then, flying with the Yaki, testing out my powers.

add_npc_line.speaker: $WingmateActor
add_npc_line.comment: Meet me outside. We'll talk some more when we're back in our pilot seats.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (intrigued)So, what's the status of the investigation?

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Take all the time you need. We can't afford to mess this up, or we'll be the laughing stock of the entire Protectorate.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (eager)Excellent! Then tell me, are these Yaki an organised threat to the Protectorate? Do they have a base of operations that we can target?

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (excited)Outstanding work, operative! I will relay this intel to Intervention right away.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (smug)Those overblown grunts will finally see the importance of the work we do.('overblown grunts' meaning self-important military people)

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: If you want to participate, you'd better prepare for action.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: Once the Protectorate forces are under way, I'll mark their position for you.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (relieved)I see. That conclusion does match our observations. These pirates behave far too erratically.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: In that case, I will attempt to sway Intervention to tone down their war preparations and instead get an anti-pirate task force under way.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (proud)Again, excellent work, operative. You've done Sol a great service.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (somber)My only regret is that we haven't found out what happened to Cadet Shinamon.

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (worried)Are you all right, operative?

add_npc_line.speaker: $SecretServiceActor
add_npc_line.comment: (warningly)Don't get ahead of yourself. This matter is far too important to jump to conclusions.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (proud)The hero of the Yaki returns!

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (excited)The entire system is talking about you! Well, apart from the Xenon, but they've never been much fun.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: I guess I don't really have to say it, but you can help yourself to anything you want.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (backpedalling quickly)Uh, I mean, we'll arrange for something, OK? Our scavengers keep bringing in the weirdest stuff, and there's bound to be something you like.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (gathering herself)And then there's the matter of the amplifier.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Of course. Go and enjoy yourself. The big red button won't be going anywhere.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Welcome back, friend.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Well, as you've probably already found out, this system is protected by an arcane mechanism we don't even properly understand ourselves.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Our enemies make one false move, take one step into our home territory, and all the Xenon in this corner of the Gate network will come crashing down on their ships.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: That's just a defensive measure, though. A safeguard, in case push comes to shove.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: The real deal is this: Thanks to you, we've now got a gun to the Terran Protectorate's head.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: That trail of beacons you put down will show the Xenon the path to the greenest pastures they've ever seen... and rid us of them for a while.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: One squeeze of the trigger, and both the Terrans and the Xenon are suddenly a whole lot weaker.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: We'll be relying on you for the perfect timing. We've only got one shot at this, so make sure you're prepared before you give me the signal.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: Welcome back, friend.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (concerned)Are you sure? Is this really the ideal moment?

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (relieved)Very well. Take all the time you need.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
add_npc_line.comment: (urgent)It's done! Go and make use of it!

add_npc_line.comment: I must say, working with you has been a real rollercoaster.

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor

add_npc_line.speaker: $YakiLeaderActor
